introduction: This video begins the course by discussing the difference between architecture and microarchitecture in computer systems. It highlights the tradeoffs between speed, energy consumption, and cost, and how these factors influence the design of processors and their corresponding microarchitectures.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction to Architecture and Microarchitecture
content: Explanation of the terms architecture and microarchitecture.
Discussion of the tradeoffs between speed, energy consumption, and cost in computer systems.
Introduction to the IBM 360 as the first true instruction set architecture.
Examples of different microarchitectures and their characteristics.

sections.title: Section 2: Storage and Data Paths in Microarchitecture
content: Comparison of low-end and high-end storage capacities in different microarchitectures.
Explanation of data paths and their impact on processor performance.
Discussion of different data path sizes and their effects on performance.
Examples of processors with varying data path sizes.

sections.title: Section 3: Instruction Set Architecture and Microarchitecture Comparison
content: Explanation of the differences between instruction set architecture and microarchitecture.
Comparison of different instruction set architectures and their performance characteristics.
Discussion of the role of microarchitecture in optimizing performance.
Examples of processors with different instruction set architectures.
topics: Performance Characteristics of Instruction Set Architectures

sections.title: Section 4: Architectural and Microarchitectural Design Tradeoffs
content: Explanation of design tradeoffs in computer systems.
Discussion of how these tradeoffs influence the choice of instruction set architecture and microarchitecture.
Examples of processors with different design tradeoffs.
Analysis of the impact of these tradeoffs on performance and cost.
topics: Instruction Set Architecture and Microarchitecture Selection

sections.title: Section 5: Advanced Topics in Architecture and Microarchitecture
content: Discussion of advanced topics in computer architecture and microarchitecture.
Examples of modern processors and their characteristics.
Analysis of the future trends in computer systems.
Conclusion on the importance of architecture and microarchitecture in modern computing.
topics: Advanced Topics in Computer Architecture and Microarchitecture
